description.value:
You force creatures to temporarily forget about the target. The target is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Invisible] while within your quantum field, and memories of the target are temporarily erased or rewritten. This makes it @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Undetected] to all creatures.

The first time an enemy attempts to locate the target (such as by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Seek]{Seeking}) or uses @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Recall Knowledge] to recall information about the target, they take 8d8 mental damage with a basic Will save as they suffer painful migraines and mental static while trying to process information about the missing target. On a critical failure the enemy is also @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Confused] for 1 round.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d8.

target.value: 1 creature or object in your quantum field
